text: 26.18 Ais 35.5, 42.7, 42.16, Jon 8.12, Apo 20.32, 2 Ko 6.14, Epe 2.2, Kol 1.13 Yad nep agyoken, wɨdɨn kɨlop am tɨg yoke, sɨbgup bad ak kelɨgɨl, mɨlek ak nɨgɨnɨgabal agak. Satan kɨles ne ak kelɨgɨl, God yɨl ownɨgabal agak. Anɨgek, yɨp gos lɨnɨgel, God ne tap si tap tɨmel gɨlak okok tɨg walɨg gɨyokɨnɨgab agak. Tɨg walɨg gɨyokek, kɨli binɨb yad ke aglɨpin nab okok yenɨgel agak.
